sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import "./Product.css"; import StarRating from '../Components/StarRating'; import PrimaryNav from '../Components/PrimaryNav'; import Main from '../Components/Main'; function Product(props) { let HomeProductData = props.HomeProducts; let location = useLocation(); let Asset = location.state; const [currentImage, setCurrentImage] = useState(Asset.thumbnail); const addToCart = async () => { try { await axios.patch('http://localhost:5006/users/1', { cartList: [...Asset.cartList, Asset.id] }); alert('Added to Cart'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error adding to cart:', error); } }; const addToWishlist = async () => { try { await axios.patch('http://localhost:5006/users/1', { wishList: [...Asset.wishList, Asset.id] }); alert('Added to Wishlist'); } catch (error) { console.error('Error adding to wishlist:', error); } }; useEffect(() => { let emiResult = calemi(Asset.price); console.log(emiResult, "EMI calculation result"); }, [Asset.price]); function calemi(emicost) { let cleanedCost = parseFloat(Asset.price.replace(/,/g, '')); return (cleanedCost / 12).toFixed(2); } return ( <>
setCurrentImage(Asset.thumbnail)} />
setCurrentImage(Asset.imgone)} />
setCurrentImage(Asset.imgtwo)} />
setCurrentImage(Asset.imgthree)} />

Visit the {Asset.brand} store

{Asset.description}

({Asset.rate}) {Asset.sales}+ {Asset.unit} sold past month

₹ {Asset.price}

(-{Asset.discount} %)

₹ {Asset.compare}

In stock {Asset.stock} {Asset.unit} available

No Cost EMI

Upto ₹ {calemi(Asset.price)}

EMI Available

12 month

Bank Discounts

Get upto ₹ 1000 discount using

Credit Card

Coupon Code

Get coupon for next purchase

upto ₹ 500 cashback

Order Details

Product Name: {Asset.productName}

Category: {Asset.category}

Sub-Category: {Asset.subCategory}

Free Delivery

Shipped by Nimbus

Your product will be delivered by {formatDate(dateIn3Days)}

Seller: {Asset.brand}

Partner: Shopin

Shipping: Nimbus

Cost: ₹ {Asset.compare} (-{Asset.discount}%)

Price: ₹ {Asset.price}/-

Delivery Cost: ₹ 0

Net Amount: ₹ {Asset.price}/-

); } export default Product;
